contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.linkcon.LinkContentLabel: Content strategies for Xperience by Kentico
contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.linkcon.LinkContentShortDescription: Lukasz has been busy the past few weeks! His second blog post on Xperience by Kentico explains the topic of content modeling and options developers have to get content into Xperience's Page Builder for a marketer. He covers examples of media assets, web pages, and reusable structured content.
